protection.title: PROTECTION & ISOLATION SOLUTIONS
protection.parallaxTitle: S2PI is committed to continuously improving its production processes.

content.part1: If building fire safety must combine all actions such as facilitating the evacuation of people, implementing alert systems, smoke extraction equipment... passive protection remains the most effective and is decided from the beginning of the project by providing constructive systems using non-combustible materials that neither feed the fire nor help it spread.
content.part2: To meet environmental challenges, those of protecting people and property, one must be convinced and act with determination. This is the ambition I set when creating S2PI company to manufacture technical, economic, innovative and reliable solutions resulting from sharing the expertise and experience of its members.
content.quote: « In the world of ideas everything depends on enthusiasm. In the real world everything depends on perseverance. »
